<!-- panvimdoc-ignore-start --> Smear cursor for Neovim Neovim plugin to animate the cursor with a smear effect in all terminals. Inspired by Neovide's animated cursor. This plugin is intended for terminals/GUIs that can only display text and do not have graphical capabilities unlike Neovide, or the Kitty terminal.
